})(batch, output);]]></conditional_script><is_conditional>false</is_conditional><name>Script Operation - u_ne_key</name><operation_group/><order>1000</order><script><![CDATA[(function(batch, output) {
	for (var i = 0; i < batch.length; i++) {

     output[i] = input + "_tni_entity";

})(batch, output);]]></script><source_sys_rte_eb_field display_value="u_ne_key">31cf02bf8740c910c4a3c99d0ebb351d</source_sys_rte_eb_field><source_sys_rte_eb_fields/><sys_class_name>sys_rte_eb_script_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>alex.frankel@exfo.com</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-02-02 17:04:34</sys_created_on><sys_id>9df9f3ee1b08c2d06e86e0cb234bcbc3</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Script Operation - u_ne_key</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Service Graph Connector for EXFO" source="x_snc_exfo_cmdb">aa514eec877274103e867518cebb35ae</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_rte_eb_definition display_value="SG-EXFO Network Element">e3dc46d487f778103e867518cebb3567</sys_rte_eb_definition><sys_rte_eb_entity display_value="temp">deec0ad487f778103e867518cebb351c</sys_rte_eb_entity><sys_scope display_value="Service Graph Connector for EXFO">aa514eec877274103e867518cebb35ae</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_rte_eb_script_operation_9df9f3ee1b08c2d06e86e0cb234bcbc3</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>alex.frankel@exfo.com</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-02-02 17:04:34</sys_updated_on><target_sys_rte_eb_field display_value="u_ne_key_tni_entity">1df9f3ee1b08c2d06e86e0cb234bcbc0</target_sys_rte_eb_field><target_sys_rte_eb_fields/><type display_value="Script Operation">941f88e273b333002b6265a751ab9e84</type><use_unique_input_sets>true</use_unique_input_sets></sys_rte_eb_script_operation></record_update>
